<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We may have created empty live ranges for partially undefined uses, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can&#39;t keep them because we won&#39;t find defs in them later.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Step 2: Extend live segments to all uses, constructing SSA form as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Visit all def operands. If the same instruction has multiple defs of Reg,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : MRI-&gt;def&#95;operands(Reg))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a70e2de8376b84c468e8a5762fda4c419">createDeadDef</a>(&#42;Indexes, &#42;Alloc, LR, MO);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveIntervalCalc::extendToUses(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp;LR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lanebitmask">LaneBitmask</a> Mask, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &#42;LI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangecalc/#ad09d2d2f0c1d47c7bc6eb04e33b5e51d">getRegInfo</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindexes">SlotIndexes</a> &#42;Indexes = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangecalc/#a11a21f58b3a7b8b7c401958cd3f7304f">getIndexes</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SlotIndex, 4&gt;</a> Undefs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LI != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#af4a07ae5c460ac08439a1a71d15e0166">computeSubRangeUndefs</a>(Undefs, Mask, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>, &#42;Indexes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Visit all operands that read Reg. This may include partial defs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsSubRange = !Mask.all();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getTargetRegisterInfo();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;reg&#95;nodbg&#95;operands(Reg)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clear all kill flags. They will be reinserted after register allocation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by LiveIntervals::addKillFlags().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.isUse())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">      MO.setIsKill(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MO::readsReg returns &quot;true&quot; for subregister defs. This is for keeping</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// liveness of the entire register (i.e. for the main range of the live</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interval). For subranges, definitions of non-overlapping subregisters</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// do not count as uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MO.readsReg() || (IsSubRange &amp;&amp; MO.isDef()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#a92a6b0a9b7228d190b0a7d8ae3ef03c7">SubReg</a> = MO.getSubReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#a92a6b0a9b7228d190b0a7d8ae3ef03c7">SubReg</a> != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lanebitmask">LaneBitmask</a> SLM = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>.getSubRegIndexLaneMask(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#a92a6b0a9b7228d190b0a7d8ae3ef03c7">SubReg</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.isDef())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">        SLM = ~SLM;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore uses not reading the current (sub)range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((SLM &amp; Mask).<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64stacktagging-cpp/#a8e818224d2d1de9b995783ff897b0083ab7e4e0120a041dbe6528b050c04269e0">none</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine the actual place of the use.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = MO.getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpNo = (&amp;MO - &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(0));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> UseIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;isPHI()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!MO.isDef() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cannot handle PHI def of partial register.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The actual place where a phi operand is used is the end of the pred</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MBB. PHI operands are paired: (Reg, PredMBB).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      UseIdx = Indexes-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindexes/#a662867d9274595cdac0092afa45888be">getMBBEndIdx</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OpNo + 1).getMBB());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for early-clobber redefs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isEarlyClobber = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.isDef())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">        isEarlyClobber = MO.isEarlyClobber();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;isRegTiedToDefOperand(OpNo, &amp;DefIdx)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: This would be a lot easier if tied early-clobber uses also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// had an early-clobber flag.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">        isEarlyClobber = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(DefIdx).isEarlyClobber();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      UseIdx = Indexes-&gt;getInstructionIndex(&#42;MI).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#ae3b98982e2036f3d26806de5ed5e02d0">getRegSlot</a>(isEarlyClobber);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MI is reading Reg. We may have visited MI before if it happens to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reading Reg multiple times. That is OK, extend() is idempotent.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangecalc/#ad445a5028efdf094173a202811f003e3">extend</a>(LR, UseIdx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, Undefs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
